tag.name: Google Tag
tag.notes:
Here, we disable the default page view event and leave a separate GA4 event to handle the page view.

More information:
https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/views?client_type=gtm

tag.name: GA4 event - page_view
tag.notes:
Shopify pixels are loaded within a "sanbox" - an `<iframe />` element which has limited access to data. 
Because of this, the "page location" (the current URL) cannot be automatically detected and needs to be provided manually.

Shopify documentation:
https://shopify.dev/docs/api/web-pixels-api/standard-events/page_viewed

Google documentation:
https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/views

variable.name: Google - Tag ID
variable.notes:
This is the "Google Tag" ID, which is a single tag that collects data for multiple Google products.

For more information:
https://developers.google.com/tag-platform/gtagjs

variable.name: dataLayer - coupons
variable.notes: Comma-separated list of coupon code titles
